definition: Baihequan (Fujian White Crane) martial art form

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
Meihua Quan - "Plum Blossom Fist" (Chinese Martial Art)
Pak Mei or Bak Mei - "White Eyebrow" (Chinese Martial Art)
Cai Li Fo, Choy Li Fut, Choy Lay Fut, Choi Lei Fut, Choy Lai Fut, Choy Ley Fut, Choi Lei Faht, Tsai Li Fo, Choi Leih Faht - Martial Art

military skill or technique (in former times)/all kinds of martial art sports (some claiming spiritual development)/self-defense/tradition of choreographed fights from opera and film (recent usage)/also called kungfu 功夫/CL:種|种[zhong3]
Wing Chun/same as 詠春拳|咏春拳[yong3 chun1 quan2]/Yongchun - "Singing Spring Fist" (Chinese martial art)
Long Xing Quan - "Dragon Fist" - Martial Art
Ba Ji Quan "Eight Extremes Fist" - Martial Art
Hei Hu Quan - "Black Tiger Fist" - Martial Art
